sentence: GOP Sen. Thom Tillis plans to appear as a special guest? at a fundraiser slated for next week benefiting Chuck Edwards, a primary challenger of embattled North Carolina Rep. Madison Cawthorn, according to an invitation sent to potential donors in the lobbying sector.
author: Kate Ackley
title: GOP senators, lobbyists aid challengers to lightning rod House members

sentence: GOP Sen. Thom Tillis plans to appear as a special guest? at a fundraiser slated for next week benefiting Chuck Edwards, a primary challenger of embattled North Carolina Rep. Madison Cawthorn, according to an invitation sent to potential donors in the lobbying sector.
author: Kate Ackley
title: GOP senators, lobbyists aid challengers to lightning rod House members

sentence: The advertisement comes as some Republicans in North Carolina consolidate support around his opponent state Senator Chuck Edwards.
author: Andrew Stanton
title: Trump-Backed Cawthorn's 'Lies' Ripped in Ad by PAC Linked to GOP's Tillis

sentence: The advertisement comes as some Republicans in North Carolina consolidate support around his opponent state Senator Chuck Edwards.
author: Andrew Stanton
title: Trump-Backed Cawthorn's 'Lies' Ripped in Ad by PAC Linked to GOP's Tillis

sentence: Tillis has endorsed Cawthorn's primary opponent, state Sen. Chuck Edwards, who has also been backed by a number of other Republicans, including North Carolina state Sen. Phil Berger and House Speaker Tim Moore.
author: Jon Skolnik
title: Madison Cawthorn called out for "lying" in new ad funded by Republican senator's super PAC
